snippet: Dealing with some antsy kids? One solution is quality children's apps. Not only are they perfect for rainy day fun, but they can extend your school's curriculum into the vacation.
abstract: Dealing with some antsy kids? One solution is quality children's apps. Not only are they perfect for rainy day fun, but they can extend your school's curriculum into the vacation.

headline.main: Children's Apps That Inject a Little Learning Into Vacation
